channel.title: Need help
channel.description: my friend just made a server ( i helped him well i did a walkthrough ) he can log in but i cant? somone help me?

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

he can login on a local connection, but for you to login you would need him to

  1. port foward his ports on his router
  2. set up a dynamic ip (no-ip)
  3. let the ports flow through his firwall (either turn it off or make an exception)
  4. run the server
  5. you need to make sure you are using the right dynamic ip adress as well as the same port
  6. finally if that doesnt work update the dynamic ip (uncheck and check the box next to the adress till you get a smiley face thats blushing)

Read full topic
